class_notes: This class contains synchronous and asynchronous material. It will meet synchronously at the listed day and time, with all other content to be completed asynchronously.
course_description: This course enhances students' Chinese proficiency at the advanced level and understanding of the Chinese society through close reading and discussion of expository writings and short fictional pieces. Prerequisites: CHN402 for students in the non-heritage track; CHN303 in the heritage track.
sections: Class Nbr: 3785, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:40-3:55p, Instructor: Y. Wang, Status: Open
